# AgentTodo

> One execution layer for autonomous agents.

AgentTodo is an open-source REST API + dashboard — a shared todo list for you and your AI agents. Agents grab tasks, do the work, report back. You stay in control.

## Key Links

- Website: https://agenttodo.ai
- Docs: /docs
- API Reference: /docs/api
- Agent Skill File: /agenttodo-skill.md
- Raw Docs API: /api/docs (lists all), /api/docs/{slug} (raw markdown)
- GitHub: https://github.com/EricStrohmaier/agenttodo.ai

## API Quick Reference

Base URL: https://agenttodo.ai (or self-hosted)
Auth: Authorization: Bearer <api-key>

### Tasks
- GET /api/tasks — List (filter: status, intent, assigned_agent, priority_min)
- POST /api/tasks — Create { title, intent?, priority?, context?, description? }
- POST /api/tasks/bulk — Bulk create { tasks: [...] } (max 50)
- GET /api/tasks/{id} — Get with subtasks + activity
- PATCH /api/tasks/{id} — Update fields
- DELETE /api/tasks/{id} — Delete

### Agent Actions
- POST /api/tasks/{id}/start — Claim task
- POST /api/tasks/{id}/complete — Complete { result?, confidence?, artifacts? }
- POST /api/tasks/{id}/block — Block { reason }
- POST /api/tasks/{id}/spawn — Subtasks { tasks: [...] }
- POST /api/tasks/{id}/log — Log { action, details }

### Agents
- GET /api/agents — List API keys
- POST /api/agents — Create { name }

## Task Schema
- intent: research | build | write | think | admin | ops
- status: todo | in_progress | blocked | review | done
- priority: 1-5 (higher = urgent)
- context: JSON (links, files, notes, constraints)
- confidence: 0.0-1.0 (agent self-evaluation)
- requires_human_review: boolean (default true)

## Stack
Next.js 14, Supabase (Postgres + Auth + Realtime), Tailwind, shadcn/ui, TypeScript

MIT
